name: Code-Correction
description:
【The second FNAF fan game made by a Chinese (the latest and the last one till now)】

One day, your best friend Alex asked you (a programmer) for help. His restaurant "Poly and his friends’ " recently introduced some animatronics to attract customers. But there's something wrong with them.

You are invited to check and repair them.

However, the restaurant without windows, the walking robots, the strange effects are always on your mind. 

WU9VIEFSRSBOT1QgWU9VUlNFTEYsIEhFIElTIE5PVCBUUlVFLCBFVkVSWVRISU5HIElTIElOIE4nUyBIRUFELCBIRSBJUyBISU0sIFlPVSBDT05UUk9MTEVEIEhJTSwgSEUgQ09OVFJPTExFRCBISU0=

Soon, you'll find the fact, or just the "fact" in front of the fact.

wish to HavE Lots of fun, Player :)
